name: Magnetic Shaving Derby + Space Surfing 2-in-1 MegaPak
name_original: Magnetic Shaving Derby + Space Surfing 2-in-1 MegaPak
description:
USE THE MAGNET TO ATTRACT THE RAZOR TO SHAVE THE FACE
                                                                         and
                                                    Be A Penguin In Space
                                                                                                                         

Controls are: MOUSE
ESC for pause menu
F1 to toggle fullscreen, or
F2, F3, F4 to change window size (1x, 2x, 3x)
Alt-F4 to quit

This is a new port of my old iOS game from 2010, which was an enhanced version of a DS homebrew I'd made the year before.. my first game.. it came out of a friendly little coding competition where we made something based on a name generated by the Random Videogame Name Generator... Enjoy! x
